class_notes:
Please note that the first day this class will meet is January 18th.


Semester topic: Histories of Display: Museum and Archaeology in the Mediterranean and the Middle East
course_description: This course is an advanced graduate-level introduction to historiography as applied to the study of Islam and Islamic Civilizations Studies.  It is premised on the conviction that grounding in the theories and practices of historiography is crucial for graduate and post-graduate work in these fields.
sections: Class Nbr: 1708, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 2:30-5:30p, Instructor: R. Margariti, Status: Open
